content.brief:
Cyber.gov includes hypertext links or pointers to information created and maintained by other Federal Government agencies and/or other public or private organizations. Cyber.gov provides these links and pointers for your information and convenience.

If you click on a link to an outside or third-party website, you will leave the cyber.gov website, and your activity on any third-party sites will be governed by the third parties’ privacy and security policies.

Please note that we are not responsible for the content of any third-party website.  The inclusion of links and pointers to third-party websites is not intended to assign importance to those sites or the information contained on those sites, and should not be considered an endorsement or a recommendation by the Office of the Federal Chief Information Officer of any views or materials offered by these sites.  We do not control or guarantee the accuracy, relevance, timeliness, or completeness of the information contained on any linked site.
